verses.verse: Then the second <WH8145> lot <WH1486> fell <WH3318> to Simeon, <WH8095> to the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families, <WH4940> and their inheritance <WH5159> was in the midst <WH8432> of the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah. <WH3063>
So they had <WH1961> as their inheritance <WH5159> Beersheba <WH884> or Sheba <WH9579> and Moladah, <WH4137>
and Hazar-shual and Balah <WH1088> and Ezem, <WH6107>
and Eltolad <WH513> and Bethul <WH1329> and Hormah, <WH2767>
and Ziklag <WH6860> and Beth-marcaboth and Hazar-susah,
and Beth-lebaoth and Sharuhen, <WH8287> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages; <WH9161>
Ain, <WH5871> Rimmon <WH9558> and Ether <WH6281> and Ashan, <WH6228> four <WH702> cities <WH5892> with their villages; <WH9161>

and all <WH3605> the villages <WH9161> which <WH834> [were] around <WH5439> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> as far <WH5704> as Baalath-beer, Ramah <WH9561> of the Negev. <WH9561> This <WH2088> [was] the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families. <WH4940>

The inheritance <WH5157> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> [was taken] from the portion <WH2506> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> for the share <WH2506> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was too <WH4480> large <WH7227> for them; so the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> received <WH5157> [an] inheritance <WH5159> in the midst <WH8432> of Judah's inheritance. <WH5159>

Now the third <WH7992> lot <WH1486> came <WH5927> up for the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families. <WH4940> And the territory <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was as far <WH5704> as Sarid. <WH8301>

Then their border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up to the west <WH3220> and to Maralah, <WH4831> it then touched <WH6293> Dabbesheth, <WH1708> and reached <WH6293> to the brook <WH5158> that is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Jokneam. <WH3362>

Then it turned <WH7725> from Sarid <WH8301> to the east <WH9506> toward the sunrise <WH4217> <WH8121> as far <WH5921> as the border <WH1366> of Chisloth-tabor, and it proceeded <WH3318> to Daberath <WH1705> and up to Japhia. <WH3309>

And from there <WH8033> it continued <WH5674> eastward <WH9506> toward the sunrise <WH4217> to Gath-hepher, to Eth-kazin, and it proceeded <WH3318> to Rimmon <WH9558> which stretches <WH9638> to Neah. <WH5269>
And the border <WH1366> circled <WH5437> around <WH5437> it on the north <WH6828> to Hannathon, <WH2615> and it ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at the valley <WH1516> of Iphtahel. <WH3317>
[Included] also [were] Kattah <WH7005> and Nahalal <WH5096> and Shimron <WH8110> and Idalah <WH3030> and Bethlehem; <WH1035> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
This <WH2088> [was] the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families, <WH4940> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
The fourth <WH7243> lot <WH1486> fell <WH3318> to Issachar, <WH3485> to the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families. <WH4940>
And their territory <WH1366> was to Jezreel <WH3157> and [included] Chesulloth <WH3694> and Shunem, <WH7766>
and Hapharaim <WH2663> and Shion <WH7866> and Anaharath, <WH588>
and Rabbith <WH7245> and Kishion <WH7191> and Ebez, <WH77>
and Remeth <WH7432> and En-gannim and En-haddah and Beth-pazzez.

And the border <WH1366> reached <WH6293> to Tabor <WH8396> and Shahazumah <WH7831> and Beth-shemesh, and their border <WH1366> ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at the Jordan; <WH3383> sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
This <WH2088> [was] the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Now the fifth <WH2549> lot <WH1486> fell <WH3318> to the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families. <WH4940>
And their territory <WH1366> was Helkath <WH2520> and Hali <WH2482> and Beten <WH991> and Achshaph, <WH407>
and Allammelech <WH487> and Amad <WH6008> and Mishal; <WH4861> and it reached <WH6293> to Carmel <WH3760> on the west <WH3220> and to Shihor-libnath.

And it turned <WH7725> toward the east <WH4217> <WH8121> to Beth-dagon, and reached <WH6293> to Zebulun, <WH2074> and to the valley <WH1516> of Iphtahel <WH3317> northward <WH6828> to Beth-emek and Neiel; <WH5272> then it proceeded <WH3318> on north <WH8040> to Cabul, <WH3521>
and Ebron <WH5683> and Rehob <WH7340> and Hammon <WH2540> and Kanah, <WH7071> as far <WH5704> as Great <WH7227> Sidon. <WH6721>

And the border <WH1366> turned <WH7725> to Ramah, <WH7414> and to the fortified <WH4013> city <WH5892> of Tyre; <WH6865> then the border <WH1366> turned <WH7725> to Hosah, <WH2621> and it ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at the sea <WH3220> by the region <WH9112> of Achzib. <WH392>
[Included] also [were] Ummah, <WH5981> and Aphek <WH663> and Rehob; <WH7340> twenty-two cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>

This <WH2088> [was] the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families, <WH4940> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
The sixth <WH8345> lot <WH1486> fell <WH3318> to the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali; <WH5321> to the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families. <WH4940>

And their border <WH1366> was from Heleph, <WH2501> from the oak <WH436> in Zaanannim <WH6815> and Adami-nekeb and Jabneel, <WH2995> as far <WH5704> as Lakkum; <WH3946> and it ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at the Jordan. <WH3383>

Then the border <WH1366> turned <WH7725> westward <WH3220> to Aznoth-tabor, and proceeded <WH3318> from there <WH8033> to Hukkok; <WH2712> and it reached <WH6293> to Zebulun <WH2074> on the south <WH5045> and touched <WH6293> Asher <WH836> on the west, <WH3220> and to Judah <WH3063> at the Jordan <WH3383> toward the east. <WH4217> <WH8121>
And the fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> [were] Ziddim, <WH6661> Zer <WH6863> and Hammath, <WH2575> Rakkath <WH7557> and Chinnereth, <WH3672>
and Adamah <WH128> and Ramah <WH7414> and Hazor, <WH2674>
and Kedesh <WH6943> and Edrei <WH154> and En-hazor,
and Yiron <WH3375> and Migdal-el, Horem <WH2765> and Beth-anath and Beth-shemesh; nineteen <WH8672> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
This <WH2088> [was] the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
The seventh <WH7637> lot <WH1486> fell <WH3318> to the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families. <WH4940>
And the territory <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol <WH847> and Ir-shemesh,
and Shaalabbin <WH8169> and Aijalon <WH357> and Ithlah, <WH3494>
and Elon <WH356> and Timnah <WH8553> and Ekron, <WH6138>
and Eltekeh <WH514> and Gibbethon <WH1405> and Baalath, <WH1191>
and Jehud <WH3055> and Bene-berak and Gath-rimmon,
and Me-jarkon and Rakkon, <WH7542> with the territory <WH1366> over <WH4136> against <WH4136> Joppa. <WH3305>

And the territory <WH1366> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> proceeded <WH3318> beyond <WH3318> <WH4480> them; for the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went <WH5927> up and fought <WH3898> with Leshem <WH3959> and captured <WH3920> it. Then they struck <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719> and possessed <WH3423> it and settled <WH3427> in it; and they called <WH7121> Leshem <WH3959> Dan <WH1835> after the name <WH8034> of Dan <WH1835> their father.

This <WH2088> [was] the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families, <WH4940> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>

When they finished <WH3615> apportioning <WH5157> the land <WH776> for inheritance <WH5157> by its borders, <WH1367> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> an inheritance <WH5159> in their midst <WH8432> to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>

In accordance <WH5921> with the command <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> they gave <WH5414> him the city <WH5892> for which <WH834> he asked, <WH7592> Timnath-serah in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Ephraim. <WH669> So he built <WH1129> the city <WH5892> and settled <WH3427> in it.

These <WH428> are the inheritances <WH5159> which <WH834> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> and the heads <WH7218> of the households of the tribes <WH1> of the sons <WH4294> of Israel <WH1121> distributed <WH3478> by lot <WH5157> in Shiloh <WH1486> before <WH7887> the Lord, <WH6440> at the doorway <WH3068> of the tent <WH6607> of meeting. <WH168> So they finished <WH4150> dividing <WH3615> the land. <WH2505>
